# [color=purple]Champion[/color]
>[color=yellow]Passive 1;[/color] >[color=Brown]Darken light -[/color] If you check any Nk it will say that player can attack but they didnt attack anyone yet with your night ability _[color=Brown]Test Faith [/color]_ _**[3 uses]**_
>[color=yellow]Day ability 1;[/color] >[color=Brown]Knowing spirit -[/color] Know how many BD members there is at the end of the night _**[1 uses]**_ > >[color=yellow]Day ability 2;[/color] >[color=Brown]Past mistakes -[/color] Select a player you already checked with [color=Brown]Test Faith [/color], at the end of the night you will get the results of that player again _**[2 uses]**_
>[color=yellow]Night ability 1;[/color] >[color=Brown]Test Faith -[/color] Select a player, Find out if they have the ability to **attacked or convert** someone, and find out if they attacked someone before or is attacking someone tonight. It will say they attacked someone even if the attack failed to kill. **[unlimited uses]** > >[color=yellow]Night ability 2;[/color] [color=Brown]Unholy thoughts-[/color] Select a player, that player can not be healed tonight (any healers attempting to heal the player will get a message saying "the player did not require healing" like usally when a player doesnt need healing). Cant select the same player 2 nights in a row. (still can be delayed just not HEALED) _**[2 uses]**_
>[color=yellow]Win Con - [/color] Defeat the [color=Blue]Blue Dragon[/color] and any neutrals who seek to do you harm
_**PLEASE READ THIS**_ Sheriff will guaranteed spawn in both games and paladin can spawn in as normal along other invest.
**_RESULTS FROM TEST FAITH_** 1) "Your target **can not** attack or convert", "Your target did not attack tonight or in previous nights" 2) "Your target **can** attack or convert", "Your target did not attack tonight or in previous nights" 3) "Your target **can** attack or convert", "Your target did attack tonight or in previous nights"
Targets that can kill or convert - Butler - Assassin - MM - CL - Pretender - Inqu - Hunter - Prince - Knight - Pala - Alch - ALL CAN BE CHANGED ----------------------------------------------- Pros: - Can Find people who can attack and see if they are a threat - Can use his secondary ability to find out if a target has changed class, allowing them to attack or find out if they have attacked without wasting a night on them - can find out the number of Unseen/Cult left - Can use Smite to defend himself and a target from a conversion and allow him to kill the converter - can find any fake neutral claims along with cult/unseen
Cons: Can really only find Assassin,Cult,MM but does have the ability to check if that player has changed their results
--------------- Questions that you could answer for this class:
1 - will this be a good class to play along with in the game? 2 - will you have fun playing this class? 3 - do you think this class is too overpowered or too under powered? 4 - do you think this class will change the game in a positive or negative way?

BD
Invest

Passive 1;

Day ability 1;
Knowing spirit - Know how many cult/unseen there is at the end of the night 1 uses

Day ability 2;
Past mistakes - Select a player you already checked with Test Faith , at the end of the night you will get the results of that player again [2 uses]

Night ability 1;
Test Faith - Select a player, Find out if they have the ability to attacked or convert someone, and find out if they attacked someone before or is attacking someone tonight. It will say they attacked someone even if the attack failed to kill. [unlimited uses]

Night ability 2;
Smite - If a player tries to convert you or your target than you will kill the player attempting to convert. Not usable till day 3 [2 uses]

Win Con - Defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals who seek to do you harm

Champion

Passive 1;
Darken light - If you check any Nk it will say that player can attack but they didnt attack anyone yet with your night ability Test Faith [3 uses]

Day ability 1;
Knowing spirit - Know how many BD members there is at the end of the night [1 uses]

Day ability 2;
Past mistakes - Select a player you already checked with Test Faith , at the end of the night you will get the results of that player again [2 uses]

Night ability 1;
Test Faith - Select a player, Find out if they have the ability to attacked or convert someone, and find out if they attacked someone before or is attacking someone tonight. It will say they attacked someone even if the attack failed to kill. [unlimited uses]

Night ability 2;
Unholy thoughts- Select a player, that player can not be healed tonight (any healers attempting to heal the player will get a message saying “the player did not require healing” like usally when a player doesnt need healing). Cant select the same player 2 nights in a row. (still can be delayed just not HEALED) [2 uses]
